component.name: Riot
component.summary: A decentralized, secure messaging client for collaborative group communication

description.p: Riot is a decentralized, secure messaging client for collaborative group communication. Riot's core architecture is an implementation of the matrix protocol.
Riot is more than a messaging app. Riot is a shared work-space for the web. Riot is a place to connect with teams. Riot is a place to to collaborate, to work, to discuss your current projects.
Riot removes the barriers between apps, allowing you to connect teams and functionality like never before.
Riot is free. Riot is secure.
